thread.title: Lois N- from PA
thread.title_full: Burgers' Smokehouse reviewed by Lois N- from PA

author: Lois N- from PA
title: Lois N- from PA
text: I have been a customer of Burgers for years and have enjoyed everything I have ordered. No one has bacon like you guys. My whole family loves when I order your products. In fact, I was just looking over your recent catelogue to order one of your hams for the holiday. Keep up the good work
